description:
LsausUSD._calculateYield(address,uint256) (src/token/lsausUSD.sol#328-343) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- k = (_saversPercentage * 1e18) / 1_000_000 (src/token/lsausUSD.sol#331)
	- yield = k * (nBalance - accumulatedReward[account]) / d (src/token/lsausUSD.sol#336)
markdown:
[LsausUSD._calculateYield(address,uint256)](src/token/lsausUSD.sol#L328-L343) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [k = (_saversPercentage * 1e18) / 1_000_000](src/token/lsausUSD.sol#L331)
	- [yield = k * (nBalance - accumulatedReward[account]) / d](src/token/lsausUSD.sol#L336)
